/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly red and white, rise up to meet the overcast sky. A few construction cranes punctuate the skyline, hinting at the ongoing development in the city. Bare trees line the street, their leafless branches adding a touch of starkness to the urban landscape. The perspective of the image, taken from a high angle, offers a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings, providing a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
